definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: he-lamb, battering-ram (As. kirru, Zim. in Schwally:ZAW x. (1890), 186; perh. lamb fr. dancing, skipping, galloping in field; (battering-) ram as in Eng., fr. butting; cf. Ar. kab4un ram and buttress, Lane; also battering-ram cf. Dozy:ii. 440);—sg. only Is 16:1 the lamb of the ruler (as tribute); elsewh. pl. [[כָּרִים]] Am 6:4, 1Sa 15:9, 2Ki 3:4, Je 51:40 (in sim.), Ez Eze 27:21, Eze 39:18; ´[[חֵלֶב כ]] De 32:14 the fat of lambs; ´[[דַּם כ]] [[וְעַתּוּדִים]] Is 34:6 the blood of lambs and goats; [[כָּרִים]] = battering-rams Ez Eze 4:2, Eze 21:27, Eze 21:27 (in v:a Co rds. [[שָׂרִים]], cf. AV; MT RV as above).—Vid. also [[בֵּית כָָּר]] p. I I I supr.
